author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Convert the Wafer8 algorithm from DDD to DD4Hep format

#### PR validation:

Used the test code to dump the wafer geometry and checked with Firework

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

No need to backport
title: Phase2-hgx202 Transfer the wafer algorithm for HGCal to DD4HEP format
